ygData.subject: Re: Lord Nagafens Demise
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Mark - the problem is that your message was 1 part comment, and 4 parts sig file.  Most of us, I m sure, misunderstood the intent. (I know *I* did). It
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:09 AM 8/30/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Reedo" <reedo@...>
>
>Are you kidding me. I've been part of this list for over two months. Did
>you suddenly decide to bring this up this time because all I said were three
>words. How is that any different from the person that said "Great story"?
>So what if my signature file has a few lines of advertising. I've been
>posting here all this time to hear about and contribute to the bard class in
>Everquest. I though the story about the take down of Lord Nagafen was very
>cool. I would love to be a part of that someday. If someone comes in here
>spamming the mailing list with advertising, great ban them I'm all for that.
>But that's not even close to what I have done.

Mark - the problem is that your message was 1 part comment, and 4 parts sig
file. Most of us, I'm sure, misunderstood the intent. (I know *I* did).
It looked to me like a typical MLM marketing message (which I get about 4
million of a day. Give or take.) I think we misunderstood that your
"Great Story" referred to the Lord Nagafen tale from the title, and thought
that it referred to the telephone number or something.

I personally apologize, and I just hope you can remember to add a little
more to your comments next time so we don't have any further "oopses" ;)

In Service,
Talies the Wanderer
Assistant Moderator
